description: A tax-efficient savings account that allows you to invest in stocks and shares with the benefit of tax-free returns.
features: Access to a wide range of investment options
No capital gains tax on returns
suggestedFor: Customers looking for medium-risk long-term growth opportunities

eligibilityCriteria.incomeRequirement: None, but recommended to have disposable income

terminationConditions.uponWithdrawal: No penalties, but reinvestment allowance reset annually
terminationConditions.uponExceedingAnnualLimit: No further contributions accepted until next tax year

description: A personal pension plan that gives you control over your retirement savings and investment decisions.
features: Flexible access from age 55 (rising to 57 in 2028)
Option to take a tax-free lump sum
suggestedFor: Individuals seeking control over their retirement investments and comfortable with investment risk.

eligibilityCriteria.incomeRequirement: Earned income to receive full tax relief

terminationConditions.uponRetirement: Access from age 55 (rising to 57 in 2028), subject to pension rules
terminationConditions.uponDeath: Funds passed to beneficiaries, may be subject to inheritance tax

description: A savings account that offers a fixed interest rate for a specific period.
suggestedFor: Savers looking for a safe and predictable return on their savings.

description: A tax-efficient savings account where interest earned is tax-free.
suggestedFor: Individuals seeking a safe, tax-free way to save cash.

description: A long-term, tax-efficient savings account for children.
features: Choice of cash or stocks and shares
riskLevel: Low to High (depending on investment choice)
suggestedFor: Parents or guardians saving for a child's future.

description: A pension scheme set up by an employer for their employees.
suggestedFor: Employees saving for retirement through their workplace.

terminationConditions.uponRetirement: Access from age 55 (rising to 57 in 2028), subject to pension rules
terminationConditions.uponLeavingEmployment: Option to transfer to another pension scheme

description: A savings account that encourages regular saving with a potentially higher interest rate.
features: Higher interest rate than instant access
suggestedFor: Individuals who want to build a savings habit and earn a better return.

eligibilityCriteria.incomeRequirement: Regular income to support monthly deposits

goalSuitability: Saving for a specific goal (e.g., holiday, car)

terminationConditions.uponEarlyWithdrawal: May incur significant penalties or account closure

description: A tax-efficient account to help people save for their first home or retirement, with government bonuses.
features: Can be used for first home purchase or retirement
riskLevel: Low to High (depending on investment choice)
suggestedFor: Individuals aged 18-39 saving for their first home or retirement.

terminationConditions.uponFirstHomePurchase: Funds can be withdrawn tax-free for a qualifying purchase
terminationConditions.uponRetirement: Funds can be withdrawn tax-free from age 60

description: A financial product that provides a guaranteed income for life in retirement.
features: Optional features (e.g., inflation protection, spouse's pension)
suggestedFor: Retirees seeking a secure and guaranteed income stream.

eligibilityCriteria.incomeRequirement: Sufficient pension pot to purchase an annuity

taxConsiderations.taxFreeAllowancePerYear: 25% of pension pot can be taken tax-free

terminationConditions.uponDeath: May provide income to spouse/beneficiaries depending on options chosen

description: A medium to long-term investment that offers a fixed or variable return over a set period.
suggestedFor: Investors seeking a balance of income and capital growth with a lower risk profile than stocks.

taxConsiderations.taxFreeAllowancePerYear: Varies based on income and ISA allowance

description: A flexible way to access your pension pot, allowing you to take an income while the rest remains invested.
suggestedFor: Retirees who want flexible access to their pension and are comfortable with investment risk.

taxConsiderations.taxFreeAllowancePerYear: 25% of pension pot can be taken tax-free

terminationConditions.uponDeath: Remaining funds passed to beneficiaries, may be subject to inheritance tax

description: A savings account designed to help first-time buyers save for a deposit on their first home.  *Note: Closed to new applicants as of 30 November 2019, but existing accounts continue.*
suggestedFor: First-time buyers saving for a deposit. *Note: No longer available to new customers.*
goalSuitability: Saving for a first home deposit

terminationConditions.uponFirstHomePurchase: Bonus paid upon completion of purchase
terminationConditions.uponClosure: Account closed, bonus may be lost if not used for qualifying purchase

description: A type of investment fund that tracks a specific market index, such as the FTSE 100.
suggestedFor: Investors seeking low-cost, diversified market exposure.

taxConsiderations.taxFreeAllowancePerYear: Varies based on investment wrapper (e.g., ISA)

terminationConditions.uponSale: Funds can be sold at prevailing market price

description: A flexible and low-cost pension, designed for those on lower incomes or who are self-employed.
suggestedFor: Individuals with low or irregular income, and self-employed.

terminationConditions.uponRetirement: Access from age 55 (rising to 57 in 2028), subject to pension rules
terminationConditions.uponDeath: Funds passed to beneficiaries, may be subject to inheritance tax

description: A savings account that requires you to give notice before withdrawing your funds, often offering a higher interest rate.
features: Higher interest rate than instant access
suggestedFor: Savers who want a better return and are willing to give notice before accessing their funds.

description: Funds traded on a stock exchange, similar to stocks, offering diversified investment in a specific index, sector, or asset class.
suggestedFor: Investors seeking diversified exposure with low costs and trading flexibility.

taxConsiderations.taxFreeAllowancePerYear: Varies based on investment wrapper (e.g., ISA)

description: Drawdown specifically within a Self-Invested Personal Pension, offering more control over income and investments in retirement.
investmentOptions: Wide range, including stocks, bonds, funds
suggestedFor: Experienced investors wanting control in retirement.

description: A current account that offers a higher interest rate on balances, often with conditions.
features: Higher interest than standard current account
suggestedFor: Customers who actively manage their finances and can meet the account conditions.
goalSuitability: Regular savings within a current account

terminationConditions.uponNotMeetingConditions: Interest rate may revert to standard rate

description: A fund that invests in a portfolio of properties, offering potential rental income and capital appreciation.
suggestedFor: Investors seeking property exposure without direct property ownership.

description: A pension product designed to provide a regular income throughout retirement, with a focus on stability.
suggestedFor: Retirees prioritizing a steady, reliable income stream.

terminationConditions.uponDeath: Income may continue for a spouse, depending on options
